pinyin: fáng dì chǎn xìn tuō jī jīn
description: An investment trust composed mainly of real estate assets. It distributes rental income and profits from property sales to investors.

examples.chinese: 我准备配置一点房地产信托基金
examples.translation: I plan to allocate some funds to Real Estate Investment Trusts.

examples.chinese: 房地产信托基金收益比较稳定
examples.translation: Real Estate Investment Trust returns are relatively stable.

examples.chinese: 他通过房地产信托基金分散风险
examples.translation: He diversifies risk through Real Estate Investment Trusts.
